element.text: 2.1 Escape from confinement - Agriculture (including biofuel feedstocks)
2.10 Escape from confinement - Research and ex situ breeding (in facilities)
2.11 Escape from confinement - Live food and live bait
2.12 Escape from confinement - Other escape from confinement
2.3 Escape from confinement - Botanical garden/zoo/aquaria (excluding domestic aquaria)
2.4 Escape from confinement - Pet/aquarium/terrarium species (including live food for such species)
2.5 Escape from confinement - Farmed animals (including animals left under limited control)
2.6 Escape from confinement - Forestry (including afforestation or reforestation)
2.9 Escape from confinement - Ornamental purpose other than horticulture
1.2 Release in nature - Erosion control/dune stabilisation (windbreaks, hedges, ?)
1.3 Release in nature - Fishery in the wild (including game fishing)
1.5 Release in nature - Landscape/flora/fauna 'improvement' in the wild
1.6 Release in nature - Introduction for conservation purposes or wildlife management
1.7 Release in nature - Release in nature for use (other than above, e.g. fur, transport, medical use)
1.8 Release in nature - Other intentional release
3.10 Transport - contaminant - Transportation of habitat material (soil, vegetation, ?)
3.3 Transport - contaminant - Food contaminant (including of live food)
3.4 Transport - contaminant - Contaminant on animals (except parasites, species transported by host/vector)
3.5 Transport - contaminant - Parasites on animals (including species transported by host and vector)
3.6 Transport - contaminant - Contaminant on plants (except parasites, species transported by host/vector)
3.7 Transport - contaminant - Parasites on plants (including species transported by host and vector)
4.11 Transport - stowaway - Other means of transport
4.3 Transport - stowaway - Hitchhikers in or on airplane
4.4 Transport - stowaway - Hitchhikers on ship/boat (excluding ballast water and hull fouling)
4.6 Transport - stowaway - People and their luggage/equipment (in particular tourism)
4.7 Transport - stowaway - Organic packing material, in particular wood packaging
6.1 Corridor - Natural dispersal across borders of invasive alien species that have been introduced through pathways 1 to 5
